definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Spanish unemployment soared, and the budget went into deep deficit.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙失業率飛速上升，預算陷入深深的赤字之中。

sentences.english: Mr Green has been out of work for several months and is on his uppers.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生失業好幾個月了，現在已過得山窮水盡。

sentences.english: Unemployment and unfilled vacancies can exist side by side .
sentences.chinese: 失業和未填補的空額可以同時並存。

sentences.english: Would you rather live in a country with no unemployment?
sentences.chinese: 你願意生活在一個沒有失業的國家嗎？

sentences.english: But who loses their jobs at the mass layoffs?
sentences.chinese: 但在大規模失業期，沒工作的是誰呢？

sentences.english: Many unemployed Americans have already caught on.
sentences.chinese: 許多失業的美國人都在抓牢這個機會。

sentences.english: Wall Street gains after a smaller-than-expected number of jobs lost and a surprise drop in the unemployment rate.
sentences.chinese: 小於預期的失業數和失業率的神奇下跌使美股上漲。

sentences.english: Wall Street gains after a smaller-than-expected number of jobs lost and a surprise drop in the unemployment rate.
sentences.chinese: 小於預期的失業數和失業率的神奇下跌使美股上漲。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about the unemployment problem in the U.S.?
sentences.chinese: 你能給我們講講美國的失業問題嗎？

sentences.english: Local officials Dinh Cong Than and Nguyen Van Binh say most of all the people fear unemployment
sentences.chinese: 當地官員丁公俊和阮文平說，大多數人害怕失業。

sentences.english: Several factors lead to this downward spiral of the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 幾大因素使得失業狀況呈現螺旋形惡化。

sentences.english: But long-term high unemployment will reduce the quality of the workforce.
sentences.chinese: 但長時間的高失業率會降低工人的勞動素質。

sentences.english: The government is taking measures to resettle those laid-off workers.
sentences.chinese: 政府正採取措施重新安頓那些失業工人。

sentences.english: 'You don't want to quit precipitously since you can traumatize yourself even more by facing extended un employment .
sentences.chinese: 他說，不要倉促離職，因爲長期失業會讓你更加苦惱。

sentences.english: The unemployed engineer wrote a dozen applications for jobs but go nothing.
sentences.chinese: 失業的工程師一連寫了十幾封求職信，但一無所獲。

sentences.english: Unemployment will continue to climb for some time globally.
sentences.chinese: 全球失業人數在一段時期內將繼續上升。

definition: to be employed/to be in post/on-the-job
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
to be defeated/to lose/to fail (e.g. experiments)/failure/defeat/CL:次[ci4]
to retire/to leave office/to quit a job
